title: [Great Cavern, Stalagmite Forest]
description: The stalagmites and stalactites stand farther apart as the cavern opens to the south.  The cavern slopes downward and is quickly covered by a layer of mud and plant debris.  The thin layers of mist behind you are replaced by a thick yellow fog that shrouds the bog below you.
paths: Obvious exits: north, east, west, northwest, down
